sentences.en: Despite his bulk he moved lightly on his feet.
sentences.cn: 尽管他身形庞大，移动起来还是很灵巧。

sentences.en: Great bulk does not always mean great weight.
sentences.cn: 体积大并不总是意味着份量重.

sentences.en: He moved his menacing bulk closer to the table.
sentences.cn: 他把自己骇人的庞大身躯向桌子挪近了些。

sentences.en: His legs were pitifully thin compared to the rest of his bulk.
sentences.cn: 他的双腿和他庞大身躯的其他部分相比瘦得可怜。

sentences.en: Shopkeepers buy them in bulk and resell them for £150 each.
sentences.cn: 店主们先大量购进，然后再以150英镑的单价将它们转卖出去。

sentences.en: Sloping walls on the bulk of the building create an optical illusion.
sentences.cn: 大楼主体的斜墙给人造成一种视错觉。

sentences.en: The bulk of consumers are based in towns.
sentences.cn: 大多数消费者都是城镇居民。

sentences.en: The bulk of the book concerns Sandy's two middle-aged children.
sentences.cn: 书中主要描写桑迪的两个已到中年的孩子。

sentences.en: The bulk of the people voted.
The bulk of the population concentrates in the cities.
sentences.cn: 大部分人口集中在城市里.

sentences.en: The bulk of the population lives in cities.
sentences.cn: 大多数人口居住在城市里。

sentences.en: The dough will rise until it is double in bulk.
sentences.cn: 面团会发酵到原来的两倍大。

sentences.en: the great bulk of a building
The truck pulled out of the lot, its bulk unnerving against the lawn.
sentences.cn: 卡车从空地上开出来，庞大的车身小心翼翼地避让着草坪。

sentences.en: They added extra pages to bulk the book out.
sentences.cn: 他们增加额外页数使书更厚.

sentences.en: Things are usually cheaper if you buy them in bulk.
sentences.cn: 如果你整批买这些东西的话是较便宜的.

sentences.en: Use extra vegetables to bulk up the omelette.
sentences.cn: 再加些蔬菜使煎蛋看上去量更大。

words.tran_cn: 体积大的；庞大的；笨重的
使扩大，使形成大量；使显得重要

phrases.tran_cn: 散装水泥卡车；散装水泥运输车
容积密度，体积密度；单位体积重量
大批，大量：数量、数目或体积很大
土壤容重；土壤颗粒密度

trans.tran_cn: （大）体积，（大）量，庞大的身躯，主体，大宗
trans.tran_en: the main or largest part of something

trans.tran_cn: 变得越来越大； 使更大
使成堆； 使聚成大量
